name: Grey Haven
description:
Embark on a journey through the realm of 'Nightmare' as you assist Friends who have lost their memories. From Half-Deamon Warrior to Dimension engineers and enigmatic priests, extend an invitation to these individuals from various worlds to find solace within the safe haven of 'Grey Haven.’

Meet New Friends




During your exploration of the 'Nightmare,' you will encounter a diverse cast of Friends. Protect and assist them. Together, you will conquer the challenges that lie ahead.

Into the Nightmare




Explore the depths of the 'Nightmare' and hunt down the formidable Deamons that dwell within. Adapt your combat style by seamlessly switching between entirely different weapons, creating a unique fighting style that suits your preferences.

Slay the Nightmares




From powerful demons fueled by twisted emotions and memories to deadly creatures lurking within the realm of nightmares, they will relentlessly try to kill you. Armed with various weapons, combos, and all means at your disposal, eliminate them.

Build Your Haven




Welcome to 'Grey Haven,' a secure haven boasting a witch's cottage and a quaint garden. Build your own home, gather essential resources, and Decorate your house.
